dialogue.text: Yo, for an incorporeal being who fades from memory, you're pretty sick at this!
You really do sound wonderful, Ghost. There's a lot of feeling in your voice.
O-oh... Really? Thank you! Both of you!
It's just... nice to share something... even if it won't last.
What won't last? We should totally make an album together! Ghost n' PJ! Feat. OJ!
PJ, the curse... How would an album work if people forget?
That sounds wonderful... truly. It's the nicest thing anyone's ever...
But, yes. You see... I'm cursed. No matter how much fun we have, no matter how much you like me...
...eventually, you'll walk away, and it'll be like I never existed.
